title: Insert HTML String After Element
description: In this lab, we will explore how to use the `insertAdjacentHTML()` method in JavaScript to insert an HTML string after the end of a specified element in the DOM. By the end of the lab, you will have a better understanding of how to manipulate the DOM with JavaScript and enhance the functionality of your web applications. Get ready to dive into the world of dynamic web development!

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
